brooch of shielding was a magical protective device. A full-capacity brooch had a base value of 1,500 gp.
A brooch of shielding was a small piece of jewelry used to fasten a cloak or cape. They were often made of silver or gold. Most commonly, brooches of shielding were adorned with Mystras or Azuths holy symbols.
A brooch of shielding could harmlessly absorb the force darts from a magic missile spell directed at the wearer. A single brooch could only absorb a set amount of energy before melting.
*Nayeli Goldflower a paladin from the city of Daggerford and an adventurer who worked with other warriors of Waterdeep, performing missions on behalf of Laeral Silverhand in the late 15 century DR.
*Guardians of Daggerford the guard organization from Daggerford who protected the lives of the citys Dukes. Members of the Guardians wore signature brooches of shielding in the late 15 century DR.
